alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis; Monroe; Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 9:35AM CDT until June 29 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Monroe County in south central Iowa... Wapello County in southeastern Iowa... Davis County in southeastern Iowa... Appanoose County in south central Iowa... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 935 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Promise City to 5 miles south of Exline to 6 miles northwest of Brashear, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ottumwa, Centerville, Albia, Bloomfield, Ottumwa Industrial Airport, Lake Sundown, Rathbun Lake, Eldon, Moravia, Agency, Moulton, Mystic, Cincinnati, Blakesburg, Pulaski, Drakesville, Exline, Floris, Melrose and Unionville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
